## Element interface

Describe a flex-progress element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Element 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [enabled](./flex-progress.element.enabled.md) | <code>boolean</code> | The active state of the element |
|  [flex](./flex-progress.element.flex.md) | <code>number</code> | Flexing factor, set both grow and shrink |
|  [flexGrow](./flex-progress.element.flexgrow.md) | <code>number</code> | Grow factor |
|  [flexShrink](./flex-progress.element.flexshrink.md) | <code>number</code> | Shrink factor |
|  [maxWidth](./flex-progress.element.maxwidth.md) | <code>number</code> | Maximum width |
|  [minWidth](./flex-progress.element.minwidth.md) | <code>number</code> | Mimimum width |
|  [width](./flex-progress.element.width.md) | <code>number</code> | Fixed width element |
